page.title: 17SHOPPING & TRANSPORT CONT
page.content: Residents can collect the news papers from the village shop. Baumber residents must travel to Horncastle. there is a sunday paper that is delivered.There is a co op milk delivery that comes every morning except Sundays. Gregorys deliver milk in Hemingby. The post man comes five days aweek and sometimes in the evening.There is a taxi service in our block which some people use. Many people own bicycles which are used mainly for pleasure some people travel to work by bicycle. People who don't own their own car find shopping and transport difficult. There a few trains in this area the nearest station is Market Rasen.
